snippet: Shawn Mitchell, the San Diego Chargers’ chaplain, said on Thursday that Junior Seau’s family would allow his brain to be examined by researchers who study head trauma.
abstract: Family of the late NFL linebacker Junior Seau, who died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the chest, will allow his brain to be examined by researchers who study head trauma.
lead_paragraph: Shawn Mitchell, the San Diego Chargers’ chaplain, said on Thursday that Junior Seau’s family would allow his brain to be examined by researchers who study head trauma.

headline.seo: Junior Seau’s Family to Donate Brain for Study of Head Trauma
headline.main: Family of Seau Decides to Give Brain for Study
headline.print_headline: Family of Seau Decides To Give Brain for Study
